root.name: Wheelie
root.description: Wheelie is about riding a motorcycle over obstacles and jumps while controlling speed, revs and fuel levels in a very early game similar to Trials HD. Multiple paths along the level are available with some leading to dead ends. Fuel stops are also possible in order to refuel. Once the end of the level is reached the course must be driven in reverse while being raced back by a ghost over the same obstacles and reach the end safely.
